      • HoughLines

        public java.util.ArrayList<ij.gui.Line> HoughLines(ij.ImagePlus imp,
                                                   int min_length,
                                                   double step_line,
                                                   double min_theta,
                                                   double max_theta,
                                                   double step_theta)
        Hough lines detection: Perform line detection on a binary image
        Parameters:
        imp - : 8-bit Binary ImagePlus
        min_length - : Minimum number of points lying on a line to return it
        step_line - : Step size (pixels) between parallel lines for iterative line search
        min_theta - : Start looking for lines with orientation corresponding to this Rho angle (degrees)
        max_theta - : Stop looking for lines with orientation corresponding to this Rho angle (degrees)
        step_theta - : Angle step size for line search (degrees)
        Returns:
